text: Alloh taolo [ʙaroi muqoisai musriku muvahhid] mardero misol mezanad, ki cand sarik dar ʙorai [molikijati] u pajvasta ʙo ham ixtilofu musocara dorand va dar muqoʙilas marde, ki tahti farmoni jak nafar qaror dorad. Ojo in du nafar [az nazari mavqeijat] jaksonand? Sitois maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, vale ʙestarason namedonand
